mapper.insert: insert into scfp_enterprise (name, credit_code, legal_person, id_card, address, role) values (#{corpname}, #{credit_code}, #{legal_person}, #{id_card}, #{address}, #{type});
mapper.update:
update scfp_user
uname = #{uname},
password = #{password},
`name` = #{name},
`identity` = #{identity},
phonenum = #{phonenum},
email = #{email},
`status` = #{status},
mapper.select: select u.id, u.uname, u.name, u.identity, u.phonenum, u.email, u.enterprise_id, u.fid, r.id, r.name roleName, e.role enterpriseType, e.name enterpriseName from scfp_user u left join scfp_user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id left join scfp_role r on ur.role_id = r.id left join scfp_enterprise e on e.id = u.enterprise_id where u.uname = #{uname} and u.password = #{password} and u.status = '启用' -- and r.status = '启用'

select u.id, u.uname, u.name, u.identity, u.phonenum, u.email, u.enterprise_id, u.fid, r.id role_id, r.name roleName, e.name enterpriseName, e.role enterpriseType from scfp_user u left join scfp_user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id left join scfp_role r on ur.role_id = r.id left join scfp_enterprise e on u.enterprise_id = e.id where u.id = #{id}

SELECT e.id, e.name, e.credit_code, e.legal_person, e.id_card, e.address, er.id TYPE, er.role typeName, u.name pName, u.phonenum pPhonenum, u.email pEmail, r.name pType FROM scfp_enterprise e LEFT JOIN scfp_enterprise_roles er ON e.role = er.id LEFT JOIN scfp_user u ON u.enterprise_id = e.id LEFT JOIN scfp_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN scfp_role r ON r.id = ur.role_id WHERE e.id = #{id} AND r.name = '管理员'
